name: Ab_Hotel
address: No-1 1st Street, North main road, Banakulam, Kumbakonam, Pin-612546
facility: Welcome to our Hostel PG, where comfort meets affordability and community thrives. We offer spacious, well-furnished rooms with single, double, or triple sharing options. Enjoy high-speed internet, TV lounges, and outdoor spaces for relaxation. Nutritious meals, laundry facilities, and 24/7 security are provided. Dedicated study areas and regular community events enhance your experience. Join us for a comfortable and inclusive living environment.
